Production total: 3.694<ref>The U.S. made 950 M1917s (a near copy of the FT design)  but only 64 were finished before the end of the war  and none saw combat.</ref>

Tank: A7V <ref>There was  briefly  one A7V with two extra machine guns in place of the 57 mm cannon. It was later converted to use the 57mm cannon.</ref>
